r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Laravel 8 support #1100 #1102 - Enable Yii 2 on PHP 8 #1106 - Add PHP 8 asan tests #1108
### Changed - Use the observer API on PHP 8 #1089 - Remove integrations that do not yet support PHP 8 #1103 - Update containers to PHP 8.0.0 #1111
### Fixed - Fix distributed tracing on PHP 8 #1099
